Title: Requires the appointment of an independent receiver upon the closing of a charter school
Summary: Requires the appointment of an independent receiver upon the closing of a charter school to facilitate the transfer of public funds back to the appropriate school district.
LawCode: Add ยง2858, amd ยง2854, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the appointment of an independent receiver upon the closing of a charter school
